name: Itential Platform Workflow Utilities
description: Itential Platform Workflow Utilities Project has assets for As Built Documentation, Restore Archived Jobs and Tasks, Chunk Array For Loop.

document.name: As Built Documentation
document.description: Select your Pre-Built by name and As Built Auto generates an As Built document detailing the automation's parent/child relationships.

688.name: transformation
688.description: Extract Pre-Built Name Variables from input

incoming.message: Copy the following Markdown text and paste it into your preferred text editor for any additional updates to the Pre-Built As Built Documentation. Click "END JOB" when done.

7eff.name: makeData
7eff.description: Convert into Complex Name Internal URL

a560.name: transformation
a560.description: Convert Manifest data to component map

9fb4.name: ViewData
9fb4.summary: View Issue in As Built Documentation
9fb4.description: Shows error or reason for not being able to generate As Built Documentation

incoming.header: Error Creating As Built Documentation for Pre-Built
incoming.message: An error has prevented As Built Documentation from being generated. See detail below for more information.

fab4.name: newVariable
fab4.description: Create a new Job variable by Job ID and assign it a value.

4f74.name: childJob
4f74.description: Runs the main workflow using the chunked array data.

a6b.name: aggregate
a6b.summary: Merge Archive Jobs Into Jobs Collection
a6b.description: Merge archive jobs into jobs collection

ca6a.name: aggregate
ca6a.summary: Merge Archive Tasks Into Tasks Collection
ca6a.description: Merge archive tasks into tasks collection

88ab.name: evaluation
88ab.description: Check if current count is equal to number of archived collections

304a.name: newVariable
304a.description: Job variable to hold current count.

7508.name: push
7508.description: Add backup failure to messages array

incoming.item_to_push: Failed to back up matching items from the IAP Tasks collection

8536.name: makeData
8536.description: Convert total jobs to number type

cb10.name: query
cb10.description: Get matching Job Ids to query the tasks database

9fb8.name: getTime
9fb8.description: Gets the date before # days passed in by the user

c709.name: evaluation
c709.description: Delete items from Jobs & Tasks collections?

1b51.name: newVariable
1b51.description: Create new job variable for message array.

d154.name: push
d154.description: Add Successful Backup for jobs collection message to array

incoming.item_to_push: Successfully backed up matching items from the IAP Jobs collection

57fe.name: push
57fe.description: Add message successful backup for tasks collection

incoming.item_to_push: Successfully backed up matching items from the IAP Tasks collection

1a21.name: push
1a21.description: Message that jobs deletion was successful

incoming.item_to_push: Successfully deleted matching items from the IAP Jobs collection
Successfully deleted matching items from the IAP Tasks collection

b695.name: push
b695.description: Add backup failure to messages array

incoming.item_to_push: Failed to back up matching items from the IAP Jobs collection

e0fb.name: push
e0fb.description: Failure to delete Items From Jobs collection

incoming.item_to_push: Failed to delete matching items from the IAP Jobs collection

53dc.name: push
53dc.description: Add message that failed to Delete Tasks collection

incoming.item_to_push: Failed to delete matching items from the IAP Tasks collection

87aa.name: push
87aa.description: Add message that user opted to keep old collections rather than delete.

incoming.item_to_push: User opted not to delete documents from the original IAP Jobs or Tasks collections

9f0d.name: evaluation
9f0d.description: Is there any data to archive?

5b23.name: push
5b23.description: No data exists older than input number of days

91ea.name: transformation
91ea.summary: Archive Jobs and Tasks From Data - IAP

d22e.name: makeData
d22e.description: Convert iteration number to number type

ee0f.name: transformation
ee0f.description: Use JST to create queries for deletion

1a40.name: makeData
1a40.description: Convert total jobs to number type

8c1a.name: transformation
8c1a.description: Split large array input into smaller arrays for input to child job.

cecf.name: childJob
cecf.description: Run Chunk Array Wrapper child job that serves as intermediary for the workflow containing actual functionality

document.name: Archive Jobs and Tasks From Data (1)

steps.template: No data found older than ${numberOfDays} days

document.name: As Built Full Markdown
document.template:
{%-raw%}<!-- Thank you for using the As Built Auto! -->
<!-- This is a comment in MD (Markdown) format, it will not be visible to the end user. -->
<!-- I left a trail of comments throughout the document to assist you with filling out your As Built documentation. Enjoy! -->{%-endraw%} 

## Table of Contents
{%-raw%} 
<!--Update the TOC if you've added or removed headers--> 
{%-endraw%} 

* [Project Overview](#project-overview)
  * [Stakeholders](#stakeholders)
* [Access Overview](#access-overview)
  * [Common Customer Bookmarks](#common-customer-bookmarks)
  * [Shell Sessions](#shell-sessions)
* [Architecture & Environments](#architecture-&-environments) 
  * [Lab Environment](#lab-environment)
  * [Staging Environment](#staging-environment)
  * [Production Environment](#production-environment)  
* [Custom Applications & Adapters](#custom-applications-&-adapters)  
* [Artifacts](#artifacts) 
   {%for componentName, items in componentMap.items() %}
    {%if componentName == 'trigger'%}
    {%elif componentName == 'json-forms'%}
        {% if items|length != 0 %}
  * [{{componentName|title}}](#{{componentName}})
        {%endif%}
    {%else%}
    {% if items|length != 0 %}
  * [{{componentName|title}}s](#{{componentName}}s)
     {%endif%}
    {%endif%}
   {%endfor%}
* [Use Cases](#use-cases)
* [Open Issues](#open-issues)
* [Repository Info](#repository-info)
* [Personnel at Itential](#personnel-at-itential)
* [Support](#support)
